<!-- wp:etch/text {"metadata":{"name":"Text"},"content":"\u003c!-- wp:etch/raw-html {\u0022content\u0022:\u0022ndocument.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {n  const colorElements = document.querySelectorAll('[data-color]');nn  colorElements.forEach(element =\u003e {n    const bgValue = getComputedStyle(element).getPropertyValue('--bg').trim();n    const contentWrapper = element.querySelector('[class*=\u0022__content-wrapper\u0022]');nn    if (!bgValue || bgValue === 'undefined') {n      element.style.display = 'none';n      return;n    }nn    if (contentWrapper) {n      const color = new Color(bgValue);n      const hexValue = color.hex();n      const rgbValue = color.rgb().string();n      const hslValue = color.hsl().string();nn      const colorInfo = document.createElement('div');n      colorInfo.innerHTML = `n        Hex: ${hexValue}n        RGB: ${rgbValue}n        HSL: ${hslValue}n      `;n      contentWrapper.appendChild(colorInfo);n    }n  });n});nn// Simple Color conversion classnclass Color {n  constructor(color) {n    this.color = color;n  }nn  hex() {n    const rgb = this.rgb().array();n    return '#' + rgb.map(x =\u003e {n      const hex = x.toString(16);n      return hex.length === 1 ? '0' + hex : hex;n    }).join('');n  }nn  rgb() {n    const div = document.createElement('div');n    div.style.color = this.color;n    document.body.appendChild(div);n    const rgb = window.getComputedStyle(div).color.match(/\u005cd+/g).map(Number);n    document.body.removeChild(div);n    return {n      array: () =\u003e rgb,n      string: () =\u003e `rgb(${rgb.join(', ')})`n    };n  }nn  hsl() {n    const rgb = this.rgb().array();n    const r = rgb[0] / 255;n    const g = rgb[1] / 255;n    const b = rgb[2] / 255;n    const max = Math.max(r, g, b);n    const min = Math.min(r, g, b);n    let h, s, l = (max + min) / 2;nn    if (max === min) {n      h = s = 0;n    } else {n      const d = max - min;n      s = l \u003e 0.5 ? d / (2 - max - min) : d / (max + min);n      switch (max) {n        case r: h = (g - b) / d + (g  [Math.round(h * 360), Math.round(s * 100), Math.round(l * 100)],n      string: () =\u003e `hsl(${Math.round(h * 360)}, ${Math.round(s * 100)}%, ${Math.round(l * 100)}%)`n    };n  }n}\u0022,\u0022unsafe\u0022:\u0022true\u0022} --\u003e\n"} /-->
<!-- /wp:etch/element -->
